(numRCQEntries, nL2TLBEntries).explanation: These are independent microarchitectural parameters where the number of request completion queue entries does not directly influence the number of L2 TLB entries;

(numRCQEntries, area).explanation: Increasing the number of RCQ entries requires additional hardware structures and storage elements, which directly increases the total chip area;

(numRCQEntries, area_cell_count).explanation: More RCQ entries necessitate additional memory cells and logic gates to implement the queue structure, directly increasing the cell count;
